name: Star Swap
description:
Star Swap is a match-3, single player game that aims to educate players on stellar evolution and the life cycle of stars. Match tiles inspired by actual elements in the evolutionary reactions that simulate what goes on inside of real stars. 

Credits

Artist: Clare Hidalgo

Designer: Em Findlay

Programmers: Jackson Singley, Alejandro Gomez, Em Findlay, Ryan Wright

Project Manager: Daniel Smalley

Special thanks: Aaron Drews at UC San Diego and with guidance from Lena Verstappen and Marc Fortier at Ubisoft.
